mapper.sql: select chnl.channelId,chnl.channelName,chnl.state,chnl.notifyUrl,chnl.orderUrl, chnl.service_user,chnl.contact,chnl.linkTel,chnl.email,chnl.inTime,chnl.modTime,chnl.modLock from umpay.t_hf_chnl_inf chnl where 1=1 #if( $channelId && $channelId!='' ) and chnl.channelId = :channelId #end #if( $channelName && $channelName!='' ) and chnl.channelName like '%$channelName%' #end #if( $state && $state!='' ) and chnl.state=:state #end #if( $service_user && $service_user!='' ) and chnl.service_user=:service_user #end #if( $from && $from != '' && $to && $to != '') and chnl.intime between '$from' and '$to' #end order by chnl.modtime desc
